pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services

Interface ContactFormMessageService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactFormMessageServiceImpl

    @Service
public interface ContactFormMessageService
    Interface for managing contact form messages.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(String senderEmail,
                 String senderName,
                 String messageText,
                 String messageSubject)
        Creates and sends the contact form message with given parameters.

        The ServiceUtils interface is using to create a contact form message
        Parameters:
        senderEmail - The String containing the sender's email
        senderName - The String containing the sender's name
        messageText - The String containing the text of the message
        messageSubject - The String containing the subject of the message

      • getNumberOfUnreadContactFormMessage

        long getNumberOfUnreadContactFormMessage()
        Returns the number of all unread contact form message
        Returns:
        A long representing the number of all unread contact form message

      • getContactFormMessages

        List<ContactFormMessage> getContactFormMessages(String listType,
                                                Integer resultStartRange,
                                                Integer resultRange)
        Returns the list of ContactFormMessage for given list type
        Parameters:
        listType - The String containing the type of the list.
        resultStartRange - The Integer containing the first returning index
        resultRange - The Integer containing the number of results
        Returns:
        A List<ContactFormMessage> representing the list of contact form messages

      • deleteContactFormMessage

        void deleteContactFormMessage(long contactFormMessageId)
        Deletes the contact form messages with given id
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessageId - The long containing the id of the message to be deleted

      • changeContactFormMessageReadStatus

        void changeContactFormMessageReadStatus(long contactFormMessageId)
        Changes the isRead status of the contact form message with given id
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessageId - The long containing the id of the message which status to be changed

      • changeContactFormMessageRepliedStatus

        void changeContactFormMessageRepliedStatus(long contactFormMessageId)
        Changes the isReplied status of the contact form message with given id
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessageId - The long containing the id of the message which status to be changed

      • getContactFormMessageSearchResult

        List<ContactFormMessage> getContactFormMessageSearchResult(String[] searchParameters,
                                                           int startResult,
                                                           Integer resultRange)
        Returns the list of ContactFormMessage for given search parameters
        Parameters:
        searchParameters - The Array of the Strings containing the search parameters
        startResult - The int containing the first returning index
        resultRange - The int containing the number of results
        Returns:
        A List<ContactFormMessage> representing the list of contact form messages

      • getContactFormMessage

        ContactFormMessage getContactFormMessage(Long contactFormMessageId)
        Returns the ContactFormMessage with given id
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessageId - The Long containing the id of the message
        Returns:
        A ContactFormMessage representing the contact form message with given id

      • setContactFormMessageReadStatusTrue

        void setContactFormMessageReadStatusTrue(long contactFormMessageId)
        Changes the isRead status of the message to TRUE
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessageId - The long containing the id of the message which status to be changed

      • addComment

        void addComment(long messageId,
                String commentText)
        Creates and saves the comment with given text
        Parameters:
        messageId - The long containing the id of the message associated with the comment
        commentText - The String containing the text of the comment
